column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I also discovered as I have aged that I am not a Monet fan
column2: this was shocking to me. While Renoir on the other hand
column3: my god the things that man can do with color and flowers. And Munch's girl by the window
column4: no matter how many times I take a pic of it or adjust my camera settings it never looks the same as the piece itself. It is almost ghostly
column5: I did not experience that with other pieces
column6: it was unique to Munch so far.
